snippet: The family of Senator Frank R. Lautenberg endorsed Representative Frank Pallone Jr., who also took some shots at the front-runner, Cory A. Booker.
abstract: Family of Senator Frank R Lautenberg endorses Rep Frank Pallone Jr of central New Jersey as Democratic candidate to fill seat left empty after Lautenberg's death.
lead_paragraph: The family of Senator Frank R. Lautenberg endorsed Representative Frank Pallone Jr., who also took some shots at the front-runner, Cory A. Booker.

headline.main: Lautenberg Family Backs Pallone for Senate
headline.print_headline: Lautenberg Family Backs Congressman for Senate
